title: Drawing random sample from town for study

content.question: Drawing a random sample of people from a town for an interview study of social attitudes ensures that

choices.label: each person in the town has the same probability of being chosen for the study
the study includes at least some respondents from every social class in town
the study will uncover widely differing social attitudes among the respondents
the sample will be large enough even though some people may refuse to be interviewed

content.answer: each person in the town has the same probability of being chosen for the study

skill.text: 2.B: Evaluate the appropriate use of research design elements in experimental methodology.
